倦く: (あく) - to tire of/to lose interest in; to be satisfied/to enjoy; (after the -masu stem of a verb) to do adequately
倦ねる: (あぐねる) - to tire of; to lose interest in; to be too much for one; to find unmanageable; to be beyond one's control; to not know what to do with
倦まず弛まず: (うまずたゆまず) - tirelessly; perseveringly; without letting up
倦み疲れる: (うみつかれる) - to grow weary; to get tired of
倦む: (うむ) - to get tired of (doing); to lose interest in
倦る: (あきる) - to get tired of; to lose interest in; to have enough
倦怠感: (けんたいかん) - physical weariness; sense of fatigue; washed-out feeling
倦怠期: (けんたいき) - stage of ennui (esp. in one's married life); period of lassitude; lethargic period; rut
倩々: (つらつら) - carefully; attentively; profoundly; deeply; at length
倫理委員会: (りんりいいんかい) - ethics committee
倫理的宗教: (りんりてきしゅうきょう) - ethical religion
倫理的投資: (りんりてきとうし) - ethical investment
倫理規定: (りんりきてい) - code of ethics; ethical code; ethical consideration; ethical provision; ethics regulation; honor (honour) code
倫理観: (りんりかん) - ethics; ethical viewpoint; moral value; sense of duty; sense of ethics
倭人: (わじん) - Japanese person (term esp. used in ancient China, etc.)
倭冦: (わこう) - Japanese pirates (of the Middle Ages)
倭名鈔: (わみょうしょう) - Wamyoruijusho (famous Heian-period Japanese dictionary)
倭名類聚鈔: (わみょうるいじゅしょう) - Wamyoruijusho (famous Heian-period Japanese dictionary)
倭国: (わこく) - Yamato; ancient Japan; name by which Chinese rulers used to call Japan
倭寇: (わこう) - Japanese pirates (of the Middle Ages)
倭歌: (わか) - waka; classic Japanese poem, esp. a tanka, often 31 morae
倭漢氏: (やまとのあやうじ) - Yamato no Aya clan
倭物: (わもの) - Japanese-made thing; Japanese goods; Japanese style thing
倭琴: (やまとごと) - ancient Japanese koto (thought to be native to Japan)
倭絵: (やまとえ) - Yamato-e (classical Japan decorative paintings)
倭訓: (わくん) - Japanese reading of a Chinese character
倭語: (わご) - native Japanese words (especially as opposed to Chinese and other foreign loanwords)
倶する: (ぐする) - to accompany/to follow; to assemble (necessary items)/to prepare
倶に: (ともに) - together/jointly; (often as ...とともに) at the same time/with/as .../including/along with; both
倶伎羅: (くきら) - Asian koel (Eudynamys scolopacea); lesser cuckoo (Cuculus poliocephalus)
倶者: (くしゃ) - Buddhist sect originating in the seventh century
倹しく暮す: (つましくくらす) - to live frugally
倹約令: (けんやくれい) - laws regulating expenditures; sumptuary edicts; thrift ordinance
假名: (かな) - kana; Japanese syllabary (e.g. hiragana, katakana)
偈: (げ) - Verso em Louvor a Buda, gatha (verso poético de uma escritura)
偉い: (erai) - ótimo, excelente, admirável, notável, distinto, importante, celebrado, famoso, eminente; muito problemático, horrível, terrível; cansativo, difícil; muito, extremamente
偉い人: (えらいひと) - celebrated personage; big-wig; person in a high position
偉い目にあう: (えらいめにあう) - to have a terrible time; to have a hard time
偉い目に会う: (えらいめにあう) - to have a terrible time; to have a hard time
偉い目に遭う: (えらいめにあう) - to have a terrible time; to have a hard time
偉がる: (えらがる) - to be conceited; to think highly of oneself
偉そうな風: (えらそうなふう) - air of importance
偉ぶる: (えらぶる) - to put on airs; to swagger; to act self-importantly
偉丈夫: (いじょうふ) - great man; great god; hero; big man
偉力: (いりょく) - power; might; authority; influence
偉才: (いさい) - genius; prodigy; (person of) great talent; remarkable person
偉物: (えらもの) - talented person; great man; great woman
偉跡: (いせき) - remaining works; results of a man's labor (labour)
